Text: Powers
Projects that improve your power generation
Gentle Mist Flow
Water Wheel power output increases from {0:+#%} to {1:+#%} over the course of the day.
A light mist lifts our wheels just enough to hum through the day.
Steady Mist Surge
'Look at that mist kick in—wheels practically sing by dusk!' — Misttail Spinner
Concentrated Mist Dynamo
Water Wheel power permanently increased by {0:+#%} all day.
We've distilled the mist into a constant force, driving wheels at peak power always.
Mist technology gives a boost to our Water Wheels.
Thermal Flow Stabilizer
Water Wheel power never drops below {0:+#%} as long as there is water, even with no current. Does nothing if your current power is already higher.
We've warmed the water to keep wheels at a steady hum, no matter the flow.
Steam-Charged Boost
Thermal Flow Stabilizer gives additional {0:+#%} minimum per Level.
[Cost] per Level per Water Wheel
'More heat, more steam—wheels won't dip below a solid push!' — Boilertail Steamwright
Thermal technologies help our Water Wheels produce power even when there is no current.
{0:+#%} power output
{0:+#%} power output (from {1:+#%} to {2:+#%})
{0:+#}HP power output from {1}
{0:+#%} Minimum power output from {1}
{0} does not give Minimum power (no water)
Gearshift Labor Sync
Reduces Large Power Wheel Worker need by {0}, maintains full power output.
'We've got the gears turning in perfect sync—no need for extra hands!' — Gearshift Foreman
Bot-Integrated Axles
Allows Bots to operate Power Wheels instead of only Beavers.
'Bots spin better than tails ever could—efficiency’s our game!' — Axlegrind Botmaster
High-Altitude Gust Harness
Windmills (Regular and Large) gain {0:+#%} power per height level.
'Skyward we perch, sipping gusts the treetops envy!' — Leafwhirl, Keeper of Breezes
Compact Wind Sails
Windmills now only occupy a 1x1 instead of 3x3 area (reload needed, visual is not updated).
Folktails wove tighter sails from willow threads—less ground claimed, more whispers of wind.
